summary: Explore the vast and beautiful world of Valley using the power of the L.E.A.F. suit: a fierce exoskeleton that grants exceptional speed and agility along with the phenomenal ability to manipulate the life and death of all living things.

name: Vanity Fair: The Pursuit
summary: Players follow Lu Yuan through important stages of his life and experience his growth trajectory from youth to maturity. It will take you to relive those decisions that you have never tried to make in reality, and feel the different life brought about by each choice.

name: Valfaris
summary: Set in a far corner of space, Valfaris is a heavy metal infused 2D action-platformer and the next game from the team behind Unity Awards finalist, Slain: Back From Hell. Brutal combat. Deadly enemies. Stunning pixel art. Savage soundtrack. Get ready to rip the galaxy a new wormhole.

name: Vangers
summary: Mind-altering sandbox game that can be described as a racing role-playing adventure game with a complicated storyline. You’ll find a unique atmosphere, complete freedom and lots of gameplay hours to figure out what’s the game is all about.

name: Vampire Rage
summary: A vertical scrolling shooter for Xbox Live Indie Games.

name: Vampirina's Nails
summary: It's so funny to be friends with little vampire, to go to school, play, solve and learn puzzles!

name: Van Pershing
summary: Zombies, Werewolfes, Frankenstein Monsters and you with fully loaded Shotgun.

name: Valheim: Mistlands
summary: At long last it’s finally here – the voyage to the Mistlands!

name: Vault Breaker
summary: Vault Breaker is a puzzle game for iOS where you attempt to guess the code in the least amount of tries.

name: Vampire Legends: Untold Story of Elizabeth
Valor and Glory: Napoleonic Wars
summary: Take on the campaign and lead one of 5 factions in an epic war to defend your lands and drive out the enemies.

name: Vampire the Masquerade: We Eat Blood
summary: Told entirely from a mobile messaging perspective, We Eat Blood is a sharp, mature and often terrifying story about your first nights as unwilling predator and prey. Hunted by unknown enemies and driven by an alien hunger, will you sever your ties with the mortal world or try to cling to your former life? Will you join ancient conspiracies, or turn the tables on forces older than the written word? Terrible power lies within your grasp, but there is always a price to pay.

name: Vanguard Princess Lilith
summary: Vanguard Princess Lilith DLC stars the dark and mysterious Daughter Of The Devil. The DLC is an updated and uncensored version of Vanguard Princess that features new battle stages, additional in-game music, as well as alternate story-lines and endings.

name: Vampire Garden
summary:
Be wary of the sun; the light that gives your plants life will take yours away.
Grow your garden across 83 levels.

name: Valentino Rossi: The Game - Special Edition
Vacation Adventures: Cruise Director 8 - Collector's Edition
summary: TWO Cruises to 4 Awesome Continents of the World

name: Vae Victus
summary: A 7 level "episode" for Doom 2 utilizing new textures and music. For fans of Deus Vult and Alien Vendetta. There are only two difficulty settings: Normal (easy and medium) and hard.The most noticable areas of difficulty change is in key areas, such as replacing an archville with a baron of hell (for example). Normal difficulty is a toned down version while Ultra Violence is what makes VV fun. My advice is to play it on UV, and if it proves too much, play it on normal. However, Map06 in particular is quite hard on UV.

name: Valentyne Stories Necromancy
summary: A story driven BL visual novel in a medieval horrific universe.

name: Vari Dungeon
summary: Explore infinite random dungeons with amazing retro pixel art graphics ! Find the best build by testing all the power-ups available, and don't forget to look for all the secrets !

name: Vampyre Cross
summary: Vampyre Cross is a freeware text adventure released as an entrant in the 2007 IF Comp short text adventure competition.

name: Vacation Adventures: Cruise Director 6
summary: A great hidden object game set aboard a cruise ship

name: Vampire: The Masquerade - Bloodlines 2 First Blood Edition
summary:
Vampire: The Masquerade - Bloodlines 2 is the successor to the iconic RPG Vampire: The Masquerade - Bloodlines. Set in a Seattle faithfully reimagined in the World of Darkness, Vampire: The Masquerade - Bloodlines 2 features reactive storytelling, fast-paced melee combat, and intriguing characters with their own hidden motives.

The First Blood Edition includes:
- Main game
- Digital Official Soundtrack
- Engraved Pistol Weapon Skin
- Retro Hunter Outfit
- Civil War Saber Weapon Skin

name: VanBay: Mosh it Up
summary: An extraordinary voxel-based RPG that transports players to the mesmerizing world of Vanbay, a city where music isn't merely a form of expression—it's the source of potent enchantments and profound mysteries. Thrust into a world of pulsating beats and magical auras.

name: Vae Victus 2
summary: Vae Victus II is an all new level set for Doom 2 utilizing new graphics and music. The episode consists of 7 levels of varying themes and difficulty. The first Vae Victus was an attempt to honor the traditional gameplay of Alien Vendetta and other classic megawads; however, VV2 is a more balanced approach that provides challenging battles without the swarms of roaming enemies. The architecture is improved over last year's offering, and is more refined in it's concept and design. I am a classic doomer at heart, so I decided to keep this wad compatible with every source port that allows for limit removing. Co-op play is also supported, as are difficulty settings. In addition, every map can be beat from pistol starts.

name: Valley of Dragons
summary: In Valley of Dragons, be prepared to raise and care for your own personal dragon!

name: Valentines Otome
summary: Valentines Otome is the sequel to Halloween Otome. Play as Mira, Emma's outgoing best friend.

name: VanimateApp
summary: VanimateApp is a 3D, Real-Time, Physics-Based Character Sim. You can sexually interact with characters of all shapes and sizes using toys and other fun stuff. Play in First- and Third-person perspectives with fully physics-based gameplay and complete control.

name: Valera: The Drunken Lobster
summary: A simple and relaxing arcade game about a lobster called Valera and his attempts to collect bottles deep in the ocean.

name: Vanguard Run
summary: Vanguard Run is a turn-based strategy game from Absolutely Magical Entertainment.

name: Vampire Girls
summary: This game is a classic puzzle game with several levels of difficulty and beautiful arts.

name: Valley of Shadows
summary: Valley of Shadows is a short psychological horror set in an ordinary American suburb. Players navigate as James, a family man seeking answers about his missing family, while grappling with paranoia and supernatural forces.

name: Vampire Legends: The Count of New Orleans
Variable
summary: The goal of the game is to score more points than the opponent. The player must take cards from the common deck. When the deck is over, points are counted. There are five types of cards. If the card is repeated, then the move is transferred to another player.

name: Valthirian Arc II
summary:
The second installment of your favorite game is back, Valthirian Arc 2 is much bigger than the previous one.

Manage your school, take command of group of student on the journey of the quest and lead your academy to become the best in the kingdom.

name: Van Gogh Museum
summary: Van Gogh Museum is a real digital museum compatible with Gameboys.

name: Valorant : Antivax Addition
summary: Valorant is an 8(7 + 1 Bonus) map MBF21 episode based around that one other mod that a couple people played. The maps are built for high intensity with consistent flow, and are filled to the brim with custom content.

name: Valentino Rossi: The Game - Digital Deluxe
Valravn
summary: Unravel a whole new dimension of fear in Valravn, a hardcore horror that drives survival instinct to full throttle

name: Valis: The Fantasm Soldier
summary:
Yuko Aso was an ordinary high school girl, but now she begins her journey as the new Warrior of Valis. Her duty is to defeat Rogles, the evil ruler of Vecanti and his 4 Vogue generals and retrieve the five shards of the Fantasm Jewel. The legend of the Warrior of Valis begins here.

From gameplay to visuals and sound, everything about this new “origin of Valis” is powered up from its original release.

name: Vampires: Bloodlust
summary: What happens when you reskin Mafia Wars to be about vampires instead of mafia dudes? Vampires: Bloodlust has the answer.

name: VarDragons
summary: VarDragons is an AR game for mobile devices.

name: Valis
summary:
Valis a 32 level singleplayer megawad for DOOM 2.
All maps were designed with pistol start in mind, but continuous play works as well.
Freelook is not required, but recommended. Turn off infinitely tall monsters. Difficulties settings are available.

name: Valley of Stars
summary:
Nonogram puzzles with a mysterious story!

Will the girl and Mr Fox be able to get to the Valley of Stars safely?

What will await them at the end of the journey?

Watch their beautiful journey to the end while enjoying the nonogram puzzles.

name: Valerosa
summary: Put yourself in the role of the courageous women and discover the challenges they had to face throughout the different eras. Fight for the fundamental rights of women in Argentina, choosing your arguments wisely and responding in the best way to win the debate.

name: Valknut
summary: An old school city building RTS where your people's greatest threat are the elements.

name: Valkkryes: Ashes of War
summary: Play Valkkryes: Ashes Of War, Infiltrate strategic locations, gather supplies and be armed, alert and alive to become the hero who stands tall on the battlefields. Drop a lot of traps and surprise objects while collecting reinforcements,

name: Valortha
summary: Valortha is an adventure dark atmospheric game with some puzzles, full explicit nudity and sexual content.

name: Vahluna Corp.
summary: Confront the alien invaders head-on, but risk dwindling ammo and their sharpshooting abilities, or take the stealthy path, sneaking around, and seeking hidden vents and passageways to outmaneuver his enemies.

name: Vampire Survivors: Whiteout
summary: The 1.7.0 patch for Vampire Survivors brings a new snow-inspired special stage, Whiteout, 2 new weapons, 1 new character and 2 new relics, with new achievements about the new content.

name: Vandozer
summary: Take control of Vandozer's three pistons to jump, skid, and cling your way through many challenging levels!

name: VaporAeon
summary: Serve, spike, and customize in this 2D Vaporwave Volleyball game! Experience '80s-inspired arcade fun with friends or AI. Precision platforming, colorful visuals, and multiplayer mayhem await. Are you ready for this neon sports adventure?

name: Vampire Nights
summary: Stalk the streets at night to suck the blood of unsuspecting villagers

name: Varooom 3D
summary: Feel the awesome power of 60FPS 3D racing!

name: Valiantia
summary: Valiantia is a role-playing game. Solve the puzzles. Altis, a female knight, and you, Leonale as her confidant, were ordered to do missions. You can help her ease the problems, making the decision, or make them more complicated. Her fate depends on you.

name: Vacant Sky Vol. I: Contention
summary: Vacant Sky is an RPG released in three episodes following the death and rebirth of Auria Edith, a small-town girl whose violent and unexpected death turns her world upside down. After her equally unexpected resurrection, Auria finds herself drawn into the heart of a mystery involving a cult of masked cultists who will stop at nothing to make her their goddess.

name: Valerian Tales
summary: Valerian Tales is a visual novel of episodic nature. Following the steps of a smuggler on his way to become a detective. But mystery, and danger are hidden and is up to you to find all clues to get the best outcome out of a foul situation.

name: Vague
summary: Vague is a first-person psychological horror inspired by early 2000s classic horror titles. Experience the unsettling atmosphere as you follow Raymond K. Fisher in his search for his missing family.

name: Valhalla & the Fortress of Eve
summary: A perplexing series of four click-and-point adventures for the Amiga.

name: Vampire: The Masquerade - Night Road: Secrets and Shadows
summary: Secrets and Shadows unlocks five new clans, a new Discipline, and two sets of variant powers to explore. Play as five new clans, unleash brand-new powers, and uncover the treasures and horrors of a whole new mission!

name: Vacuum Warrior
summary: Vacuum Warrior is a Free to Play incremental idle game. Listen to the crisp crackle of dust and debris entering your vacuum as you vacuum ridiculous amounts of dust. Upgrade your vacuums, idle gains, and robot vacuums, earn achievements, and explore numerous locations in the Vacuum Warrior universe!

name: Vampire+Hunter
summary: A micro visual novel about a wounded vampire hunter, who's trying to kill his elusive target.

name: Vanilla Sky
summary: Vanilla Sky is set in an extremely large city, similarly to DooMknight's previous map Europe released in 2005. It uses vanilla textures in very creative ways, notably with the creation of vehicles through sector detail.

name: Valzar
summary: Explore an uncharted land and recover the pieces of a broken amulet. Valzar is a tough arena action platformer with roguelike elements.

name: Vampire Ventures
summary: A match-3 quest in which Vampire Valory has to find her father who was kidnapped by Vladoric the Vampire.

name: Vacation Adventures: Park Ranger 11
summary: Help Rangers run Pinecreek Hills & the National Academy Spend a sensational Summer helping the famous Park Rangers run Pinecreek Hills & the National Parks Academy.

name: Valhellio
summary: Valhellio is a doujin shoot-em-up developed by IdeaStock.

name: Valiant
summary: Valiant is a first person shooter game.

name: Van Helsing sniper Zx100
summary: Sniper arcade game. Motion sensor control.

name: Valor & Victory: Arnhem
summary: Arnhem Sunday 17th September. Lt-Col John Frost's 2nd Battalion, The Parachute Regiment, reach Arnhem Bridge little knowing the fierce battles they would be fighting over the next few days.

name: Valkyrie Profile Niffynee
summary: Embark on the heroine's adventure. , feeling the fetters between the heroine and her partner, through the vast and magical land of Midgard, the pursuit of their own life and value change story.

name: Vareion
summary:
An authentic and exhilarating hack-and-slash RPG with 8-bit graphics!
Become the legendary magic knight Vareion and defeat the 12 gods!
Enjoy a roguelike experience with randomly generated maps!
A variety of fearsome enemies will come at you!
Equip yourself with various weapons and armor to defeat the oncoming enemies!

name: Valley of the Moon
summary: A first person exploration game about going to the Moon. Made for Ludum Dare 36.

name: Vampiric Tower
summary: Vampiric Tower is a quirky puzzle game that includes 50 puzzles of quickly increasing difficulty. While most of the puzzles involve familiar pushing/collecting exercises, there is also an additional element at play here. Your character can sometimes transform into a bat, which can help you by letting you past certain types of obstacles.

name: Vaporware
summary:
Vaporware is a collaborative project for the Eternity Engine, created by a loosely-organized group of friends from various corners of the Doom community. We like making maps, we were aware of Eternity’s capabilities, and we decided it’d be fun to create some maps that made use of those capabilities. We organized a little project amongst a few of ourselves, and over time it evolved into this.

Vaporware also includes a large quantity of new resources, including textures, monsters, weapons, ambient sounds, and an original ogg-format soundtrack composed by Julian Hope and Esselfortium.

name: Valet Parking 1989
summary: Relive the undeniable coolness of the 80s to the sound of screeching tires.

name: Vanilla Click
summary: Something new in the genre of erotic games. Undeniably beautiful animation, beauty, love and many mechanics.

name: Vault Circuit
summary: Color matching puzzle with an shape placing twist. No timers, no rush. Try to complete 42 levels, but be careful, the mess you make in one level you take with you to the next.

name: Vanguard: Fight For Rudiarius
summary: A cross-platform multiplayer space shooter, set in an alternate future where the Roman Empire never fell but continued to conquer the entire galaxy. Gladiators, known as Vanguards, do battle in vast space arenas in a bid to earn freedom. VR, Mobile and PC cross play supported.

name: Valkyrie no Densetsu Gaiden: Rosa no Bouken
summary: Graphic adventure spinoff of the Legend of Valkyrie series

name: VAD
summary:
V.A.D - A multi genre VR game for Oculus Rift -
Battle through a myriad of challenges. Explore space stations, command a space shuttle, defeat giant enemy bosses, survive trap rooms and discover devices to defeat your enemies. As well as a bunch of mini games, puzzles and achievements.

name: Vampire Panic
summary: Vampire hunting action-adventure game exclusively on PS2.

name: Vaster Claws 3: Dragon Slayer of the God World - Special Pack
summary:
The Special Pack DLC opens up the post-clear Backside and Claws world.

Special Pack Contents:
・Allows continued exploration after beating the game.
・Bonus to ForceXP (1.5x) gained on kills after beating the game once.
・Soldier Battle Results will display Growth Level (Force & Skill will hit Max at 100%)
・Get the following Items on first time beating the game:
Ring of the Mad God (Magic Ring)
Velis Crystal W x6 (Equipment enhancement material)
Velis Crystal R x6 (Magic Equipment enhancement material)
・4 more types of Soldier Marker.

name: Vast
summary: Grow procedural buildings in a vast desert landscape!

name: Vault Apocalypsis
summary: Vault Apocalypsis is a top-down roguelite arena shooter where you fight off hordes of monsters on your quest to stay the apocalypse. Power up your character, create outrageous synergies and take your build as far as you can. Invite your friends for up to 4 player online co-op.

name: Vantageous
summary: Vantageous is a highly competetive board game, where you have to strategize your piece placement, stack your pieces to increase their range and outsmart your opponent. You can play on the same device, online or against the computer! Play against your friends or challenge the rank ladder!

name: Vampire Bloody Star X
summary: This is bullet hell , bullet curtain and manic shooter 2D Game! Destroy enemies coming from all directions. It is a personal production game of high-vision visuals and music.

name: Vain Uprising
summary: A dark fantasy blend of RTS and RPG where you liberate slaves and lead them against their former masters. Expand your home encampment. Equip your army. Build outposts and crush your enemies, as long as they don't destroy you first.

name: Vacation Adventures: Park Ranger 3
summary: Enjoy a beautiful collection of Hidden Object Scenes and puzzles set in the great outdoors. Tidy up the Park and do your bit for the environment by collecting all the bonus trash items to Recycle.

name: Vaccine Hunter
summary: Vaccine hunter will allow the player to experience the hardships of a special agent's life on their own skin. Bioterrorists have launched a dangerous virus and the president asks you to collect the necessary vials with a vaccine that will help scientists to stop the epidemic. You are a professional, so you will have to deal with hordes of criminals alone and by the classic method - with the help of well-aimed shots. Collect all the ampoules and stop the coming apocalypse!

name: Valley Dash
summary: Dash! Dash! Dash as far as you can in this NES inspired arcade take on action command RPG battle action! Pick a dasher, collect gear, build your party and gather upgrades to dash as far as you possibly can.

name: Vain Dream
summary: Vain Dream is a RPG with traditionally Japanese emphasis on story and characters, as well as simple game mechanics and mostly linear progression. Its turn-based combat allows free movement on the battlefield.

name: Van Helsing: Hunter or Hunted
summary:
Legendary vampire hunter Van Helsing has been captured by the Lord Of Darkness himself, Dracula!

The Hunter has to resort to stealth, creeping around a dungeon in Dracula's castle, avoiding threats, and collecting items. Once he has collected all parts of his weapon, he can turn the tide on the enemies that were terrorizing before, and possibly even put an end to Dracula's evil for good.

Hide, explore, and kill in this stealth/fps mashup based on the classic rivalry!

name: Vacuum Story
summary: A vacuum cleaner, tied to his daily cleaning routine, passively experiences the events that affect the family that owns it.

name: Valkyria Chronicles 3: Penalty Mission - Things That Stand in the Way
summary: Collect all the recovered supplies through a bombardment, a turbulent interception, and brilliant anti-tank sniper's eyes!

name: Vampire Saga: Welcome to Hell Lock
Vacation Adventures : Park Ranger - Hidden Object Adventure Game
Vacation Adventures: Park Ranger 6
summary: Spend a sensational summer vacation helping rangers run Pinecreek Hills National Park. It’s conservation challenge year and Pinecreek’s better than ever before!

name: Vaporwave Drift
summary: Vaporwave Drift is a single (no AI) driving drift game, It's fast, easy, tight, and repeatable, with elements of collection and challenges. In the game you can choose the track you like to drift and challenge the global leaderboard(Total Laps), or you just park your car on the side of the road and listen to the music.

name: VATSim
summary: VATSim is short for the Virtual Air Traffic Simulation Network.

name: Vandalizer
summary: A game about painting graffiti on trains and some vandalism of course

name: Valkyria Chronicles 3: The Secret of Her Powers
summary:
The Secret of Her Powers is a downloadable content for Valkyria Chronicles 3. The DLC contains a mission called Power to Protect and can be purchased for 600Yen from PlayStation Store. In the Valkyria Chronicles 3 Extra Edition, it is among the several DLCs already included with the game.

Unlocked after completing chapter 14.

name: Vader Immortal: A Star Wars VR Series - Special Retail Edition
summary: Vader Immortal: A Star Wars VR Series places players in the role of a smuggler operating near Mustafar, Darth Vader's volcanic stronghold. Across three episodes, players wield lightsabers, explore Vader's fortress, and discover ancient secrets while accompanied by their droid companion Z0-E3. The narrative culminates in a final confrontation that determines Mustafar's fate. Each episode includes a Lightsaber Dojo mode where players can practice combat techniques and collect various lightsaber hilts.

name: Valhalla Online
summary: Valhalla Online fundamentally changes the usual gameplay. In addition to the new visual representation, you will encounter many new mechanics, systems and solutions that improve the gaming experience (QoL).

name: Vacation Adventures: Park Ranger 2
summary: Join the Rangers for another truly sensational Vacation Adventure in the great outdoors!

name: Valet Hero
summary: Valet Hero is an iOS game developed by Game Gatos. Cars ranging in different speeds and colors drive into a parking lot and you must direct them to different parking spots based on their color without having the car hit each other

name: Vacation Sports
summary: Vacation Sports brings the exhilaration of sports competition to your home! Players stay at a 5-star resort and enjoy a variety of their favorite classic sports, such as go-carts, dodgeball, darts, frisbee golf and and more, while also picking up other global sports played by millions around the world.

name: Valkyrie 17
summary:
After listening to a message on your answering machine, you realise that something that you thought was over is now active. Valkyrie 17! You decide to check the dossier on this again from the last 40 years and start to solve the whole thing again. After chasing all the leads with no answers you end up in The Glitz hotel, your last lead. Here your adventure begins.

The game is a graphic text adventure. The screen is split into two. The top half shows your surroundings. The bottom half describes your surroundings and here you can enter commands.

name: Valkyrie: Journey to Midgard
summary: Dragon Orb has been stolen from Asgard. Valkyrie has been sent down to Midgard to retrieve the lost treasure. The goddess must not only overcome fierce monsters, but also to face a dark conspiracy that will affect all of nine realms.

name: Valleys Between
summary: Valleys Between is a relaxing environmental puzzle game about creating thriving, beautiful worlds. Nurture life and animals, develop communities and discovering the quiet mysteries of the valley.

name: Vanitas
summary: Conversations about being online, in 495 words.

name: Vanlen Poison Forest
summary: A really mean girl's adventure through a forest

name: Vacant Kingdom
summary: Vacant Kingdom is a synthesis of bullet hell and story-driven action-RPG. Explore a whimsical yet desolate land and rally its adrift people by solving their problems.

name: Vampire Night
summary: Vampire Night is a light gun game produced by Sega's Wow Entertainment, distributed through Namco and released in 2000 for video game arcades. It was later ported to PlayStation 2 in November 2001. Two players can team up to take down on screen enemies.

name: Vallen
summary: Space combat on a massive scale. Defend your allies, destroy the Xeris and claim victory for the Vallen! Your people need you, fly your ship in an intense battle in an asteroid field to secure the sector.

name: Valletine against Darkne
summary: A 2D platform adventure game, in which you must dodge enemy obstacles and pass mobile platforms and various types of terrain that will make your journey more difficult

name: Valhalla
summary: Valhalla was a text-based (with some light graphics) ZX Spectrum and Commodore 64 adventure game published in 1983 by Legend. Set in Asgard and Midgard, the goal was to collect six mythical objects, for which you needed the help of other characters, who were taken from Norse mythology and would wander around randomly.

name: ValueHunt
summary: Whether it's a game night with your friends or a few rounds for in between. ValueHunt is a game in which you try to guess the prices against each-other.

name: Vampires: The New Birth
summary: A story-driven Gothic visual novel

name: Valley of the Old Masters
summary: The World has been in the midst of the winds of change. As a wandering artist, you end up in a mystical valley on your journey. Do you find inspiration for your art there?

name: Vavio
summary: A musical bullet hell where everything is synced to the beat!

name: Valis: The Fantasm Soldier Collection
summary: In celebration of the series’ 35th anniversary, this collection includes Valis: The Fantasm Soldier, Valis II, and Valis III.

name: Valor Time
summary: Valor Time is representative of the client family session based multiplayer action RPG of the medieval WASD non-target management system. The game process supports massive battles.

name: Vadine: Bite-Man
summary:
Decimate. Obliterate. Fornicate.
Vadine uses his own blood to wreck his foes.
Conquer 12 epic boss battles. Navigate past traps and contraptions at every corner.
So have a drink to Vadine:Bite-Man!!!

name: Vaccine19
summary: 100% Free 'Hip-Fire' Arcade Shooter! Instead of using crosshairs or sights on gun, Vaccine19 has the player visualize shot trajectory. Don't Get Infected!

name: Valakas: Immortal
summary: VALAKAS: Immortal - An action shooter from the third person in the image of the greatest streamer Valakas. Mercilessly destroy the mighty empire of Detrov.

name: Vacation Adventures: Cruise Director
summary: Spend a truly Sensational and Adventurous Summer working as Cruise Director in charge of the Americas Cruise on the super-luxurious S.S.Liberty of the Waves.

name: Vampire Saga: Pandoras Box
summary: With a chilling crime at the center of its spellbinding story, Vampire Saga is not intended for the faint of heart. Join Matthew Ward as he steals aboard a cargo ship to escape the violence of the Spanish-American War, passes out and then wakes up to find himself alone with several sinister-looking coffins. Explore eerie locations, search for hidden objects and follow a story full of nerve-pricking encounters. Without a doubt, this captivating mystery thriller will give you the creeps!

name: VA Action collection
summary: Three action-packed shooters with gripping stories, intense combat, and unforgettable challenges.

name: Vadi
summary: Build your own kingdom in the dark valley where zombies rule and stay safe from zombies. It is up to you to survive in this valley.

name: Vampiric Crown
summary: Vampiric Crown is a side-scrolling action RPG set in a strange gothic world. A young vampire girl decides to rebel against her race, upon discovering that her sister will be the victim of a macabre plan to unearth the prince of darkness ...

name: Vacuum Balaena
summary:
Take a short while and enter in an underwater world and embody a whale named Melouchax. Explore the depth of the ocean, and try to answer to your own needs, which are : breathin' and eatin' fishes. But be careful to not eat different kind of trash which draws into swarm of fishes, or you're going to accumulate to much CO2 inside you.

This game exists thanks to the NUPES Game Jam. During 32 hours we work on it, we also pick the theme which is about the pollution and how critical it is.

name: Variant: Limits
summary: Variant: Limits connects mathematics and game play, empowering deeper engagement with calculus content, making the learning experience more fun, and helping students succeed.

name: Vampire Doctor
summary: A otome game included in the Story Me app.

name: Valkyrius Prime
summary: Fight through countless enemies and hulking bosses in this indie shoot-'em-up! Teleport to dodge enemy fire, then counter with an assortment of powerful weapons. Valkyrius Prime features all new character art and story, plus many more improvements over the original.

name: Vacation Adventures: Cruise Director 7
summary: A great hidden object game set aboard a cruise ship

name: Vac Attack
summary: Hoover them up!

name: Varmintz
summary: Released way back in 2004 and developed by Skunk Games, this Frogger clone expands upon the formula and makes it stand out from the inspiration by throwing in absurd, cartoon art style reminiscent of early 2000's Cartoon Network shows, a catchy music, bonus levels and power ups. And raccoons. Five raccoons. All with their own personalities and voices.

name: Vacation Vexation
summary: Game for android and xbox live made by Nostatic Software.

name: Valorous
summary: Become Valorous! Use your powers of flight, super speed, heat vision, super strength, and x-ray vision to take down enemy bases and save the city from the militia. With exciting events, multiplayer, and stunning graphics, become a legend among heroes and unleash your full potential.

name: Vampire: The Masquerade - Swansong Victoria Ash
summary: Victoria Ash, played by Jessica Chobot, guest star in L.A. by Night, is the highest-profile Toreador in the Camarilla, and Emem's mawla. She is passing through Boston and has a favour to ask of you.

name: Vagabond's Quest
summary: Vagabond's Quest (VQ) was a web-based pit fighting and arena RPG that originally launched in the mid-1990s. The game was designed to be a text-based, multiplayer experience where players could engage in duels, develop their characters, and explore solo dungeon crawlers.

name: Vagabond's Quest 2
summary: Vagabond's Quest 2 (VQ2) was an ambitious attempt to evolve the original Vagabond's Quest into a 3D web-based MMO during the late 1990s. This sequel retained the core pit-fighting and arena combat mechanics of its predecessor but introduced 3D graphics and a more immersive environment. VQ2 was designed to push the boundaries of web-based gaming at the time, featuring a blend of PvP combat and RPG elements in a fully 3D isometric world. Despite its innovative approach, the project faced numerous challenges, and the development was eventually abandoned.

name: Vampirdzhija Vjedogonia
summary: One night the protagonist sees a beautiful woman in distress; he tries to help her but she bites him. She turns out to be a vampire! And now he will turn into a vampire too, unless he finds her again and destroy her first. So he joins with a group of vampire-hunters...

name: Vale
summary: Link #17. In a unique departure from most other case reports, this one is entirely in Japanese and its subject follows an unknown protagonist in a dark forest.

name: Vanilla Wafers
summary: A collection of 6 vanilla-compatible Doom 2 maps that are short, sweet, and to the point

name: Vampire: The Masquerade - Blood Frontier
summary: So, you want to ride with Padre and the Autarkis Gangrel of the Lost Souls coterie? You think you have what it takes to sleep rough over 1,200 miles of southern-Texas border with the Mexican Jaguar himself? To pistol-whip Sabbat incursions? To wrangle the cattle ranches and border crossings of the Circulatory System? To lasso drug mules carting vitae-laced meth? Big cojones, huh? Alright, saddle up. The border tribes can always use another quickdraw, if you pan out that is. Welcome to the Blood Frontier.

name: Vatlva
summary: A vehicle based action game for the Sega Saturn.

name: Vagnerun
summary: Vagnerun: Race, fight, and upgrade your ship to win thrilling races filled with obstacles and danger!

name: Vacation Quest: The Hawaiian Islands
summary: A hidden object game in the Vacation Quest series.

name: Vaporware Odyssey
summary: Vaporware Odyssey is a synthwave/vaporwave inspired action roguelike. You are stuck in grid space. You strive to escape to a realm of better vibes. Battle hoards of enemies, collect items and upgrades, and search for an escape from this digital dystopia.

name: Vampire Heist
summary: Fly as a bat, be unseen in the dark or phase through barriers as a cloud of bloody mist to recover what's yours!

name: Vault Cracker
summary: Help Melissa find her son, his kidnapper and avoid the police radar!

name: Vargskelethor's Hardcore Friday Super Metal Almost Criminally Violent Ultra Swedish Meatball Royal Rumble Massacre!
summary: M.U.G.E.N screenpack made by Brergrsart in tribute to Vinesauce Joel. The screenpack includes Joel himself as a playable character, complete with other characters that appear or at the very least related and/or referencing to his previous streams, including Bootleg Felix the Cat, Bulk Bogan, Jotaro Kujo, Skeletor, and so on.

name: Valkyrie Spirits
summary: Valkyrie Arena is a minimalist turn-based tactics game about epic warrior spirits from different space-times. Create the best party combinations, adapt to the situations and use the best strategies to surpass each battle in the Valkyrie Arena!

name: Vacation Simulator: Back to Job
summary: The Gig Economy has arrived in the Vacation Simulator! All Bots have gone on vacation and no one is left to Job. Time for the human to enter the “on-demand” workforce to make the perfect vacation for Bots! Time to job again!

name: Valley Run
summary: You've entered a dangerous valley full of gold and deadly challenges. Ride on a futuristic hover bike collecting coins and power ups along the way to the highest score! Are your reflexes up for the challenge?

name: Valgrave: Immortal Plains
summary: Valgrave is a free-to-play combo focused Battle Royale game. Every game you'll decide if are a spell-slinging sorcerer or prefer to let your fists do the talking. Team up and level up to show up your opponents. There are over 100,000 combinations.

name: Valdamour
summary: Valdamour is a multiplayer asymmetric PvP where the exorcist player performs rituals in a haunted mansion, while the ghost player tries to stop him by using his arsenal of spooky abilities. Avoid the ghost's attempts at killing you before you can complete the final ritual and exorcise it for good.

name: Vacation Adventures: Park Ranger 4
summary: Join the newly promoted ranger in another truly sensational Vacation Adventure in the great outdoors. Enjoy this outstanding collection of Hidden Object scenes and puzzles set in an idyllic national park. As well as finding Hidden Objects around the park you will need to perform your duties as a park ranger. Protect the environment by collecting all the bonus trash items to recycle and catalogue all the wildlife throughout the park in your wildlife Journal.

name: Valor & Victory: Shield of Cholm
summary: Shield of Cholm is the second DLC for Valor & Victory. Cholm’s emergence onto the stage of historical events of World War II came about as a result of the Russian Winter Offensive of 1941-1942.

name: Vacation Adventures: Park Ranger 15 - Collector's Edition
summary: Help Rangers run Pinecreek Hills and enjoy National Park activities.

name: VainPlanet
summary: VainPlanet is a VR shooting game aiming for high score by attacking enemies while avoiding or preventing attacks from drones.

name: Valkalim
summary: In Valkalim, you are in an unknown place tamed by enemies. There is something wrong with the sun, find out what happened and save the world from eternal darkness with the help of your axe and shield.

name: Vattle Giuce
summary: A vertical shoot-'em-up released for the Game Boy in Japan in 1991.

name: Various Daylife: Mobile
summary: In the year 211 of the Imperial Era, a new continent was discovered. Explore its every last corner as a settler of Antoecia, while living your life to the fullest in the city of Erebia.

name: Vacation Gone Awry
summary: Vacation Gone Awry is a text adventure that tells the story of an unfortunate getaway.

name: Vampire Story
summary: Vampire Story - this is a 2D RPG with elements of survival in which you will need to complete the tasks of the demon you serve.

name: Vanguard Princess: Hilda Rize
summary: Updated version of Vanguard Princess. Play with the boss character Hilda Rize in Arcade Mode and Two Player ModePlay Vanguard Princess in its original uncensored versionExclusive levels and in-game music Hilda Rize DLC Soundtrack MP3s are included

name: Valentine's Day Griddlers

name: Valhyre
summary: Valhyre Deathmatch is a shooter that serves as a proof of concept for the upcoming MMORPG Valhyre: The Aftermath. It was released as an XNA community game for the Xbox 360.

name: Valens
summary: Race for survival in the most dangerous corners of the galaxy. Fierce races are held on mysterious planets and satellites, space stations, and in abandoned mines of asteroids. Upgrade your Hover right during the race in the pit stops.

name: Vail: Enigmia Pack
summary: Join the REYAB Corporation as a mercenary and stand out with the Enigmia Skin pack. Suit up in a sleek new character outfit and build out your arsenal with exclusive weapon skins.

name: Vapor Memories
summary: A puzzle game about the way our childhood relationship with family members effects our adult relationships with them.

name: Vacation Adventures: Cruise Director 4
summary: An Exotic World cruise aboard USS Liberty of the Waves As Cruise Director in charge, enjoy a truly sensational Cruise of a Lifetime aboard the fleet’s super luxurious flagship, USS Liberty of the Waves.

name: Vanova's Stories
summary: With your friends, play as extravagant detectives in this wacky Point & Click game to solve the mystery behind multiple crimes. Will you manage to gather the clues that only you can find and share them with your team to accuse the right suspect?

name: Valhall 2000
summary: Challenge your friends and enemies to endless battles in Valhall 2000! This game lets you invite your foes to fight head to head in a 2D platformer style shooter. Pick up an AK47 or a Magic Wand and blast them all! You can also race to the finish in special climbing maps.

name: Vampire: The Masquerade - Night Road: Usurpers and Outcasts
summary: "Usurpers and Outcasts" unlocks the options to play as Tremere and Caitiff.

name: Vasara
summary:
Vasara is an arcade scroll shooter game released by Visco in 2000. All six stages.
The motif is the Battle of Sekigahara and the Jin of Osaka, but all the cavalry has been replaced with air bikes, and battleships and tanks have appeared, creating a worldview that could be described as the sci-fi Warring States period.

name: Valentines Desire: Steam Edition
summary: Valentine Desire is a 5 reel, 25 payline slot machine (pokie) with a Valentines theme.

name: Vatnik Simulator - A Russian Patriot Game
summary: Become a vatnik! In this game you can drink for Tsar and for Russia, pray to the Putin and enjoy life in a Russia! Do you respect Tsar Vladimir?

name: Valyria Tear
summary: Valyria Tear is a free and open-source 2D JRPG inspired by classic console RPGs.

name: Vacoo: The Adventure in Garbage City
summary: Single-player 2D platformer with metroidvania and puzzle elements.Discover this amazing new world has been drawn by our artists from scratch.Fend off the enemy, climb into the most secret places, learn the rules of this city and finally save your friend.

name: Valhalla Knights 2: Battle Stance
summary:
Valhalla Knights 2: Battle Stance is a Role-Playing game, developed by K2 and published by Marvelous Entertainment, which was released in Japan in 2009.

Battle Stance is an expanded version of Valhalla Knights 2 featuring all new changes.

name: Valden Saga
summary: Valden Saga is a first-person action game in which you take on the role of a royal guard sent to unravel the cause of disasters in one of the kingdom's provinces.

name: Vaulted
summary: Vaulted is a roguelike game that combines elements of top-down shooter, deckbuilder, RPG and immersive sim. Venture into randomly generated dungeons in search of resources and powerful equipment to ensure your settlement survives.

name: Valor & Victory: Kursk
summary: In an effort to reverse their fortunes in Russia, the Germans committed their best forces to the Battle of Kursk. However, they were met with an unyielding Russian defense.

name: Vampire Brides: Love Over Death
summary: A dark and intriguing hidden object game where Catalina seeks to help her ill father.

name: VariVa Revenge
summary: Dodge or parry the bullets, and attack the enemy directly! This is a new type of game that adds 2D action elements to a bullet-hell game!

name: Varmalis
summary: Old-school psychological horror inspired by Silent Hill series, based on exploration of abandoned places, combat with monsters, puzzles solving and objects and texts to find. Vincent remembers a murder he never witnessed. What if his memories were mixed with those of a real killer?

name: Valentine Candy Break 2
summary: Valentine Candy Break 2 is an arcade game that lets the user break Valentine candy with a unique heart paddle and ball. Unique animated candy levels, Cupid Mini-Bosses and powerups to collect while you progress through the levels. Thirty Levels to play in and battle mini bosses on your way to victory. Single player retro-arcade fun!

name: Vain Empires
summary: The memoir of a demonic spy in the Cold War between Heaven and Hell.

name: Vajimon
summary: The last title developed by Guillotine was the network-strategy nonsense game Vajimon, which saw players fight against each other over the internet using a variety of vegetables. Around 2003, the company's operations were terminated and its managers retired. The game servers were later briefly brought back online in 2012 for some time, but went under again afterwards.

name: Var'Alith
summary: Satisfy a demon and gather 5 living people to feed them.

name: Vanilla Inspector
summary: This is an inspection! Take your clothes off and stay calm!

name: Vaer
summary: The Light of the Sun is dying. Collect energy and return it to the sun to save the light. Made in under 48 hours for Ludum Dare 39.

name: Vampireville
summary: The government will soon obtain the right to sell Malgrey Castle because no heir has claimed the property for 100 years. All of the appraisers that were sent by your boss have gone crazy, including one of your close colleagues. Now it’s your turn! Unlock the secrets of this property using your Hidden Object skills. Appraise the old fashioned property, and figure out what caused the other real estate agents to go crazy in Vampireville!

name: Valkyrie Drive: Bhikkhuni - Complete DLC Pack
summary: VALKYRIE DRIVE Complete DLC Pack adds Mirei Shikishima and Mamori Tokonome from the anime VALKYRIE DRIVE -MERMAID- as playable characters, and 150+ new items for the Dressing Room.

name: Vampire: The Masquerade - Parliament of Knives: What Stares Back
summary: Play as a vampire of the insightful clan Malkavian or the manipulative clan Lasombra! New powers, new secrets, and new romance options await within.

name: Valor & Victory: Stalingrad
summary: The first DLC for Valor & Victory is set during the Battle of Stalingrad and covers a wide range of settings and locations. It also introduces a wealth of new features and abilities to better represent the close conflict of the historical battles.

name: Vacuulus
summary: In a small remote town, the decades-old legend of The Vacuum Man seems like nothing more than a silly hoax. But one messy, unruly young boy is about to learn the true horror that defined the legend. Experience playing as the boy, sneaking for your survival as the Vacuum Man tries to take you away.

name: Vagan Attack
summary: A space themed strategy game.

name: Vapor Run
summary: Vapor Run puts you behind the wheel of armed and armored vehicles, racing through a cyberpunk wasteland alone or with a friend, delivering contraband, stolen merchandise, and precious resources. Make runs between rival corporations earning rewards, killing patrols, and advancing.

name: Valentino Rossi: The Game - MotoGP Legendary Bikes
summary: Relive the history of the MotoGP through 29 riders, 18 teams and 14 additional legendary bikes produced from 1992 to 2006.

name: Vamps For the Memories
summary: Banter or die! Play two hunters who are racing to kill a vampire in a 90s JRPG style comedy. Solve puzzles, kill rats, and tolerate puns. It's like classic LucasArts made a Final Fantasy knock-off.

name: Vagabond Starship
summary: A riveting space adventure full of fantasy characters and a unicorn! Sir Typhil of Creulor and his fearless crew of elves, dwarves, aliens, and robots set out on a search across various unknown worlds, meeting zealots, rogues, reporters, and more as they seek out the ever-elusive rutabaga.

name: Vagrant Hearts
summary: Enjoy pure 16-bit RPG goodness! Scarllet and Beatrice are two close sisters. One of them has the gift of healing, the more she knows about her gift the more she realizes how big her responsibility is. Features party splitting, beautiful artworks and an intricate storyline.

name: Vanakatu
summary: A surreal story-driven game that uses puzzle-solving, turn based battling, and open world navigation to help Van Cat track down his evil uncle and put an end to his nefarious plans!

name: Vampire Domain
summary: Summon hordes of minions to defend your realm against invading heroes in this fast-paced fantasy strategy game. Unlock permanent upgrades, new levels and more advanced minions to survive the ever-growing threat.

name: Valley of the Moon
summary: Valley Of The Moon, is an RPG set in a fantasy world, the aim of the game is to help village merchants manage their businesses. Our character Athorias is a farmer / wizard skilled in vegetable cultivation and magic. You will have to face city problems and earn the trust of the villagers.

name: Vamps-Imulator
summary: Vamps-Imulator is an autobattle RPG that takes the ill-fated vampire player who must grow in strength and undo the curse to return to their once peaceful life. Upgrade your equipment, stats, skills, and trade for crafting recipes to undo the curse that has taken hold of your life.

name: Vapor Music Tour
summary: This is a tour of Vapor Music’s West Post Production Studio Location in Toronto, Canada.

name: Valkyrius
summary: Valkyrius combines the intense classic arcade action you'd expect from a 2D shoot 'em-up with an innovative warping mechanic that lets you effortlessly weave in and out of enemy fire. Fight across 6 unique stages with unique enemies and huge bosses. Take the weapons of your destroyed enemies and add custom powers to your fighter. Follow the story of Colonel Valterra as her battle to reclaim the Earth for the Space Colonies turns into a war for the future of humanity. Features 1 and 2 player modes, 5 difficulties, boss rush mode, stage select, online high score tables, unlockable concept art and soundtracks.

name: Vacation Adventures: Cruise Director 5
summary: Arrange fabulous excursions in the Caribbean, Europe and South America. Visit amazing tourist sights and landmarks in cities such as London, Edinburgh, Barcelona, Vienna and Istanbul. Go inside the world famous Windsor Castle where British Royal Weddings take place. Help passengers with cabins, shopping, dining, leisure on board and at Ports of Call along the way. Collect souvenirs of the cruise. Look for hundreds of hidden objects, items lost by passengers, trash for recycling. Play superb mini-games and earn badges for your achievements.

name: Valkyrie Champions
summary: Team up with up to 4 online players and defeat hoards of monsters in this action based looter-shooter! Unlock powerful tiers of weapons and equipment to develop your character into an unstoppable champion!

name: Vampire Hunters
summary: Third person survival horror game based on the anime movie and book series of the same name.

name: Val d'Isère Skiing and Snowboarding
summary: Val d'Isère Skiing and Snowboarding is a skiing and snowboarding video game and a conversion of the SNES title Tommy Moe's Winter Extreme: Skiing & Snowboarding.

name: Van Crane Bundle
summary: Use Van Crane's deadly weapons to root out the cursed plague haunting the streets of Harran with your ancient arms, forged especially to kill what cannot die.

name: Van Buren
summary:
Van Buren was the codename given to what would have been Fallout 3, a role-playing video game that was being developed by Black Isle Studios before the parent company, Interplay Entertainment went bankrupt. This resulted in the company shutting down Black Isle, which in turn laid off the PC development team on December 8, 2003, effectively cancelling the game.

Prior to its cancellation, Van Buren was set to carry on the Fallout series, but was not a sequel to Fallout 2. An official Fallout 3, unrelated to the abandoned Van Buren project, was developed by Bethesda Game Studios after Interplay sold the single-player rights of the franchise to Bethesda Softworks. It was released October 28, 2008.

name: Vampire: Darkness Falls
summary: Embrace the shadows or seek the light—survive the night in a world where your choices shape your destiny

name: Vacation Adventures: Park Ranger 7
summary: Spend a sensational summer vacation helping rangers run Pinecreek Hills National Park. It’s conservation challenge year and Pinecreek’s better than ever before!

name: Vapor dash
summary: Vapor Dash: Hardcore action platformer set in a vaporwave city. Stay in constant motion, make quick decisions, defeat enemies, and escape. Fast-paced, challenging gameplay.

name: Valentine's Rain
summary: A dark, mystery/thriller furry visual novel

name: Vampire: The Masquerade - Swansong Artifacts Pack
summary: Start the adventure with 3 personal items for Galeb, Emem and Leysha that can be equipped and provide one bonus and one penalty. You also start with 3 pouches of blood from the Prince's personal reserve… Make sure you use them wisely.

name: Vanquish
summary: This is Vanquish! A top-down pixel art shooter where you play as either an Orc Warrior or a Gnome Magician which have both crashed onto a cursed island.

name: Vacant Planet
summary: You awaken on an unknown planet that has been devastated by a virus of some kind. Scavenge gear and get ready for a battle of survival. Do anything you can to live and find out the secret behind the tragedy of your new home. and find out what's wrong with it.

name: Valakas Story
summary: Explore locations, fight with different enemies and bosses, communicate with residents, complete their tasks. Play as a village streamer from Russia named Valakas. All this adventure takes place in the beautiful far reaches of Russia.

name: Vapormaze
summary: Vapormaze is a roguelike shooter in a vaporwave maze. To escape, you have to carefully manage your ammo, health, items and upgrades. All while shooting and blowing up bad robots. Death is permanent.

name: Vagrant Shifter
summary: Vagrant Shifter is a morbid Earthbound-inspired RPG about alien parasites, wild creatures and the dead.

name: Varkij: Dream and Nightmare
summary: A turn-based RPG with tons of Dragon characters who unite to either end, embrace or save the Nightmare Dragon.

name: Valkyrie Nemesis
summary: A dungeon crawling RPG game that revolves around Norse mythology. Discovering strange events. Fighting demons, gods. Looting treasures. Customizing characters, fighting style.

name: Val d'Isère Ski Park Manager: Gold Edition
Vasteel 2
summary: The sequel to the epic mecha war strategy title Vasteel. The sequel is more story-heavy than its predecessor, and has more clearly pronounced anime/manga aesthetics. Animated cut scenes occur between the missions and advance the story. Even during the large strategic battles, characters would often engage in dialogue, and scripted events might occur. The gameplay also underwent some changes. Vasteel 2 is, like its predecessor, a hex-based, turn-based strategy game with robotic combat; however, the action sequences are gone, and the battles now proceed automatically, as in most games of this genre. Robot production and financial management were also simplified or removed. However, the player can choose to use various types of weapons before engaging an enemy in combat. For example, robots can use melee attacks, bipedal tanks can use different laser beams, etc.

name: Valorbound
summary: Valorbound is a full-loot, sandbox, PvEvP, horizontal progression, MMO-lite set in a highly stylized mid-fantasy setting. With more believable restraints on character power, Valorbound focuses on the smaller scale and more down-to-earth adventures. Survive in a wild world full of Elves, Goblins and magic, and live the fantasy life you've dreamed of.​

name: Valiant Knights: Typing Battle
summary:
"Valiant Knights: Typing Battle" is a typing game the theme of JRPG called "Valiant Knights". It features typing with style of RPG Battle.
Attack the monsters that appear one after another with your typing skill !
Beat down the many monsters and clear the all game stages !!

name: Vanilla Bagel: The Roguelike
summary: Vanilla Bagel: The Roguelike is a mostly classic RPG/Roguelike with a vast game world. The game has dozens of dungeons and items, and hundreds of unique enemies. There is a great variety in magic, curses and item enchantments.

name: Vaccine Rebirth
summary: Enter once again into the world of Survival Horror.

name: Vampire Castle
summary:
"Warning! The Vampire awakes at midnite!"

An adventure game with optional MacinTalk speech.

name: Vae Victis: Khan
summary: Conquest and seduction, sexual dominance and fiefdom management; Forging an empire is a brutal business where you must balance the needs of your budding Khaganate with your own desires. In this revenge story meets an empire simulator, the risks are high but the bounties are heavenly...

name: Vaccine Delivery Simulator
summary: Vaccine Delivery Simulator is a fun casual game. Your task is to have time to deliver the vaccine to those in need. For most of the game, you will throw the vaccine, so your accuracy is important!

name: Vanguard V
summary: Vanguard V is a fast-paced flight adventure game, designed for Virtual Reality, with diverse settings including flights through space, Earth’s surface, and the worlds below. You are the sole defender and greatest weapon against the Parasites. The freedom of flight meets action adventure!

name: Vanishing Point: Tenshi no Kieta Machi
summary: Kusanagi is a high school student. Recently, girls started to disappear from the area he lives. A friend of his sister requests to search for one such person.

name: Vazial Saga XX
summary: Brainwash the fools, exploit taxes, strengthen your armaments, prosper your descendants, and conquer the world!

name: Van Simulator
summary: Van Simulator is a delivery game where you drive a van, pick up packages, and deliver them. Expand your business, upgrade your van, and manage deliveries efficiently. Enjoy urban delivery in a low-poly environment.

name: Valentine's Day Virus
summary: Valentine's Day Virus is a SpongeBob SquarePants online game.

name: Vanguard
summary: Vanguard is a thrilling multiplayer party game that blends arcade-style visuals and gameplay with a diverse array of competitive modes. Perfect for gamers of all skill levels, it offers fast-paced action, strategic depth, and whimsical fun for an inclusive and dynamic gaming experience.

name: VanySlash
summary: Heroine, a close-combat magic-user, and her partner, an axe to fight and collect magical Tools!

name: Vampires Live
summary: Enter the world of darkness and mystique, where vampires live in the urban underworld and control the city from behind the shadows. Build your clan with fellow vampires and defend your control of the city from the ravenous zombie hordes.

name: Vampiromania: O Game
summary:
Vampiromania is a game that mixes action and role-playing, where the player controls 3 characters individually - Teodor, Petru and Ecaterina - who possess different characteristics. Teodor is a strong man who fights with his hands and protects the group with his shield. Petru, the boy, uses his sling to attack the enemies and Ecaterina is a fast woman with good kicking abilities.

The objective of the group is to find the terrible Vlad Tepes and to destroy him. Three types of different enemy creatures exist during the game: vampires, buzz and ghosts.

name: Vanguardian
summary: Vanguardian is an action-adventure game with RPG elements, monster conversion (pet system), an ever-increasing list of equipment with their own special effects, dungeon raids, puzzle aspects, and so on.

name: Vaporspace
summary: Explore the endless Vaporspace. A SHMUP inspired by idle games, rpgs and vaporwave. Defeat enemies and bosses in easy relaxing stages or challenge yourself to gain more upgrades and strive for the highest stages!

name: Vaporwave Vision Quest: Kmart Sepulcher
summary: 90's nostalgia and inner demons.

name: Vampire Origins Reloaded
summary: A third person action game by Icehill Entertainment.

name: Vampyr: Special Edition
summary:
This edition includes the following
Game: Vampyr
Exclusive Limited Edition Sleeve
Double-side poster 35 x 43 cm
The Hunters Heirlooms DLC
Set of 3 Exclusive Lithographs
Original Soundtrack

name: Vacancy Unlimited
summary: The dead fill the streets you grew up on. It's time to leave home in search for your father. Uncover the magical secrets of your family's past that will shape the apocalypse as you know it.

name: Vattroller X
summary: A Ganbarion and Bandai Japanese style role playing game released exclusively on Game Boy Advance in Japan

name: Valbrace
summary: No knight has ever survived the journey into Gnothrok keep. What makes you think you'll be any different?

name: Vampire Ascent
summary: Vampire Ascent is a casual auto-battler real-time strategy survival game with rogue-lite elements where you play a vampire lord. Survive endless hordes of enemies and defend your castle by building your own vampire kingdom. Choose from a variety of traits and upgrades to create unique builds.

name: Vacation Mogul
summary:
First, some bad news: a rich uncle you didn't know you had has passed away. Now, some good news: he bestowed his entire estate to you and your sister! Now, more bad news: your sister is missing AND your uncle's lawyer has stolen her inheritance! Can you solve the mystery behind her disappearance and reclaim what belongs to her?
The tourism business has never been easier or more fun than in Vacation Mogul, a real estate management game that challenges you to make more money than you ever dreamed possible. You'll become one of the rich and powerful as you buy and sell land, turn bungalows into ritzy hotels and build specialty shops and other attractions, all with a finger tap. Just be sure to keep one eye on your resources and the other on your bottom line!

name: Vampire Legends: The Untold Story of Elizabeth Bathory Collector's Edition
Vai Juliette!
summary: Vai Juliette! is an endless runner in which your mission is to help increase Juliette's fandom. Run non-stop faster and faster, dodging enemies and jumping over walls while collecting Cactus and Couscous along the way!

name: Valhalla Hills: Fire Mountains
summary:
With the Fire Mountains expansion comes a new mountain terrain type: volcanic mountains on lava. This landscape typically bears a stony soil full of mineral resources. On the other hand, this ground is hostile to life and green meadows are extremely rare.
There are some spells that can help you here. You can summon and activate them on the sacrificial altars.

name: Vast
summary: Vast is a virtual platform by Sandman Studios that uses Unreal Engine 5 to create immersive experiences. Creators can build their own worlds and attend thousands of events. Vast collaborates with curators to provide the best immersive experiences.

name: Vampire Survivors: The Darkasso
summary: The 1.11 update for Vampire Survivors adds The Darkasso, a new deck of Arcanas to be collected and used during runs. It also adds character skins, unlocked as final prizes for the main game Adventures.

name: Varista
summary: A VR Barista Simulation Game, fast paced arcade job simulator with an emphasis on fun interaction and customer satisfaction!

name: Vampire: The Masquerade - Coteries of New York & Shadows of New York
summary:
One of the most acclaimed RPGs of all time comes to life in an interactive novel in which your decisions will mark your destiny.

Enter the universe of Vampire: The Masquerade, one of the most popular role-playing games of all time, through two interactive novels created by Draw Distance and brought together in a single physical release.

name: Valley of The Savage Run
summary: Save the frogs from the predator. A challenging 2D pixel arcade game.

name: Vacation Adventures: Park Ranger 12
summary: Help run Pinecreek Hills and the Park Ranger Reunion Celebration Help the famous Park Rangers run Pinecreek Hills & the 25th Anniversary Ranger Reunion. Have fun organizing events on Bluewaters lake, Cherokee river and Apache trail. Ride Pinecreek’s awesome Aerial Tramway & Railroad.

name: Vacation Adventures: Park Ranger 13
summary: Help run Pinecreek Hills and New England’s Minuteman Valley Help the famous Park Rangers run Pinecreek Hills. Have fun organizing events on Bluewaters lake, Cherokee river and Apache trail.

name: Vault of Stars
summary: An adventure across the mysterious Islands of Souls. Embark on a journey to bring light back to these darkened islands, restoring the patterns of the Guardians by solving astral puzzles, engaging in magical, fast-paced combat with shadowy creatures, and uncovering the history of a ruined world.

name: Vacation Adventures: Park Ranger 10
summary: Enjoy a beautiful collection of Hidden Object Scenes and puzzles set in the great outdoors. Tidy up the Park and do your bit for the environment by collecting all the bonus trash items to Recycle. Earn extra bonuses for finding all the Lost & Found items scattered around the Park

name: Vantastic
summary: A Vantastic co-op road trip in an infinitely generated world, featuring freedom, driving, survival, and fun party games like drunk driving and racing with friends.

name: Valentine Panic
summary: A memory game that has you racing to keep your job and find a some potential love for Valentine's Day!

name: Vampire Skills
summary: Play with the vampire and use his skills in this online puzzle game. Choose the right skills to get through the obstacles with the vampire and complete the tasks in each level of the game.

name: VaporFly
summary: VaporFly is an Outrun/Cyberpunk themed, music and theme oriented endless runner experience. Our goal is to introduce you to a robust but chilling experience of a rendition of Vaporwave by us.

name: Vacation Adventures: Park Ranger 5
summary: Spend a sensational summer vacation helping rangers run Pinecreek Hills National Park. It’s centennial year and the park is bigger and better than ever. Enjoy this outstanding collection of Hidden Object scenes and puzzles set in an idyllic national park. As well as finding Hidden Objects around the park you will need to perform your duties as a park ranger. Protect the environment by collecting all the bonus trash items to recycle and catalogue all the wildlife throughout the park in your wildlife Journal.

name: Vagrant Fury
summary: Vagrant Fury is a story-driven sideshooter teleported back from The Eighties, offering voxel graphics, a retro soundtrack, hand-drawn cutscenes, and a dark storyline.

name: Vacation Adventures: Cruise Director 3
summary: Experience the Pacific and Atlantic Wonders Cruise As Cruise Director in charge, enjoy a truly sensational Cruise of a Lifetime aboard the super luxurious, USS Liberty of the Waves.

name: Vacation Adventures: Park Ranger 14 - Collector's Edition
summary: Help run Pinecreek Hills and Puerto Rico's Tropical Rainforest Parks

name: Vacation Paradise: Florida - Collector's Edition
summary: Take a Vacation in Florida! Beautiful beaches, large lakes and exciting activities await.

name: Vacation Quest Australia
summary: A seek and find adventure Down Under--over 2200 hidden objects in 28 settings. From PopCap, the makers of Mystery P.I.

name: Vairon's Wrath
summary: Set out on a quest for revenge as Vairon, a young fearless warrior. Visit unique villages and memorable characters that will help or hinder Vairon on his journey. Experience an old school style adventure with varied gameplay where you will fight monsters, solve puzzles, and much more!

name: Vandal Hearts: Flames of Judgment
summary:
A new entry in the Vandal Hearts series, Flames of Judgement follows the story of young orphan Tobias Martin as he bands together with his schoolmates to help defend his homeland against a rival kingdom. The story acts as a prequel to the original Vandal Hearts.

The series' trademark isometric combat returns, now presented in 3-D with 3-D character models. Players attempt to position themselves tactically to gain an advantage over stronger (or more numerous) foes. Combat takes place in turns, with each side moving one character per turn. Each party member can carry two weapons and switch between them without using up a "turn," allowing them to shift quickly from a sword to a long-range bow, for example. Characters gain levels through successful battles, and increase skills with a particular weapon or spell by using that weapon or spell in combat.

Many engagements expand beyond simple combat by introducing some sort of puzzle element, ranging from pushing boulders to protecting characters from attackers. Missions may also radically update their goals as progress is made. In addition to the standard game, there are also multiple endings and multiple "secret maps" unlocked across the regular levels.

name: Vanguard Princess: Online Deluxe
summary: Vanguard Princess: Online Deluxe features online netplay support for the Steam version of Vanguard Princess. The DLC is also an updated version of the game that also features unlocked characters, additional battle stages, in-game music, and story-lines.

name: Varg
summary: A love letter to the classic MS-DOS “boomer” shooter genre, in a setting loosely inspired by Brazil's most iconic UFO case. When your son goes missing, take to the streets in search of answers. Unravel the secrets of a shadowy corporation and an alien-worshiping cult that has taken over your town.

name: Valtric
summary:
The player controls a hovering land vehicle in 8 directions, and is able to shoot in the direction the vehicle faces. Obstacles block the path of the vehicle, and progress through an area is made by the player moving the vehicle upwards, scrolling the screen downwards. Bombs can be dropped directly above the vehicle, similar to Xevious. The player can pick up power-ups that enhance weapons, as well as attach 'options' to the vehicle, drones similar to those of Gradius. The 'options' fire in a direction depending on where they are attached to the main vehicle. The player can avoid danger by jumping.

The game is divided into 4 different areas, followed by the same 4 areas in more challenging versions.

Enemies consist of infinitely respawning smaller moving enemies, stationary cannons, and large boss enemies and enemy bases.

name: Varenje: Collector's Edition
summary: Our hero was spending summer happily at the cottage until curiosity forced him to sample an unknown berry at the stream. Before he knew it, everything had become incredibly large, and he was reduced to the size of a bug!

name: Valhalla: Awakening of Valkyrie
summary: This is a casual game that combines "match three + collection + dress up". With the advent of Ragnarok, the Protoss forces are insufficient, and most of the Valkyries in the Hall of Valor are living in various parts of the continent as human beings. You must lift the seal on them to summon them.

name: Vacation Paradise: California - Collector's Edition
summary: Let's take a vacation across stunning California, with fun trivia.

name: Variable Pictogram Jump
summary: An instant death action game with flying pictographs. Use jumping and zooming in and out to reach your goal! In addition to the single mode, there is also a mode that allows up to four players to compete.

name: Vampires and Afternoon Tea
summary: Crossing Death and Achieving the End

name: Vampire Family
summary: “Vampire Family” is an adult visual novel with multiple routes.

name: Vampires and Werewolves
summary: Check out the latest Vampires and Werewolves avatar items!

name: Vampire Legends: The True Story of Kisilova - Collector’s Edition
Vault Cracker: The Last Safe
summary: A hidden object game which includes a safe cracking mini game.

name: Valis Collection
summary: The epic story of Yuko Ahso from ordinary schoolgirl to the Warrior of Valis saving Earth and the Dreamland from the invading hordes from the Dark World graced the SEGA Genesis/Mega Drive over 30 years ago. Those looking to own all three titles, they can look forward to receiving an additional master slipcase to store all three titles as well as a special acrylic stand displaying Cham, Valna, and Yuko.

name: Vacuum
summary: A quick-to-play text adventure with multiple endings!

name: Vali Victorian
summary: ValiVictorian is a first-person horror mystery game that explores the world between our world and where spirits reside.

name: Valiant
summary: Valiant is a 32-level megawad for MBF-compatible source ports, created by Paul DeBruyne (skillsaw). It features extensive DeHackEd work in order to provide an enhanced roster of enemies, most of them adapted from the Realm 667 "Beastiary".

name: Valcarta: Rise of the Demon
summary: Valak, a young man, is thrust into adventure on a seemingly normal day. This adventure changes depending on a single choice he is forced to make. What path will you choose? What side will you represent? Jump into the world of Valcarta and help Valak change its fate forever.

name: Vacation Adventures: Park Ranger 9
summary: A Sensational Vacation Helping to Run TWO National Parks Spend a sensational Summer helping the Rangers run Pinecreek Hills & Buffalo Valley National Parks.

name: Vanilium
summary: This is a simple map, made in roughly 8 hours with speedrunning in mind. This level has also been built and tested with Nightmare! difficulty and is easily beatable. Can you find the fastest exit route?

name: Valiant Hearts: The Collection
summary: In Valiant Hearts: The Collection, find both Valiant Hearts: The Great War and Valiant Hearts: Coming Home.

name: Valkyrie Blade VR
summary:
Valkyrie Blade is a first-person sword fighting action game in the Virtual Reality world. Within the game, you have to use the movement of both your body and motion controllers to fight and survive against enemies in epic battles.

Move faster than your enemies, dodge and parry their attacks and strike them with your blades to finish them off.

name: Valor Legends: Eternity
summary: Welcome to Valor Legends: Eternity! It's time to embark on your amazing adventure in the Oasis to fight the Shadow forces! Valor Legends: Eternity is a 3D idle game.

name: Valencia Saga: Sophia's rebirth
summary: 故事从一个大陆中的两个国家战争开始，围绕两位主角为了拯救大陆的百姓而展开的冒险

name: Vaccine
summary: Heal the sick, save the world! You will master simple levels in an addicting and challenging missions to save the world!

name: Valkyrie Idle
summary:
A story of growing up to protect the world of Valkyrie and go looking for the gods.
Adventure through stages and dungeons and nurture a character and companions through farming

name: Valley of the Crescent Mountain
summary: Valley of the Crescent Mountain is a passion project and a farming game that adds espionage to the mix along with some magic to create a unique experience.

name: Vampire Rush
summary: A hack-n-slash tower defense game.

name: Variable Chaser Valchase
summary:
Conglomerates struggle against each other to gain the right to develop the outer space.

Valchase, the latest model of chaser, flies a mission to get back the stolen classified information.

name: Vacation Adventures: Park Ranger 16 - Collectors Edition
summary: A family friendly Hidden Object Game set in a National Park

name: Vandaan
summary: Welcome to Vandaan, a post-apocalyptic game where you must explore an abandoned city built by robots to find out why it was abandoned. In this game, you play as an adventurer who immerses themselves in a fascinating world full of puzzles and secrets.

name: Vampire: Who killed me?
summary: You are a new vampire turned against your will. Find out who turned you.

name: Valley of Shadow
summary: An autobiographical puzzle game. Solve puzzles using classic spells (Light, Force Missile, Fireball) while you explore a dark world full of secrets.

name: Vampire: The Masquerade - Coteries of New York & Shadows of New York: Collector's Edition
summary:
This edition includes the following;

+ Vampire - The Mascarade: Coteries of New York (the game)
+ Vampire - The Mascarade: Shadows of New York (the game)
+ The art book
+ The original sound track in vinyl format

name: Valor of Battle
summary: RPG RTS Active auto battler where you control your units of different classes, grow your army to defeat the oppressive Draken Empire. Cast spells in battle, strengthen your army with perks, upgrade items and enchant them with the power of the elements.

name: Valkyrie: The Magical Odyssey
summary: A fantasy sidescroller for DOS based in norse mythology.

name: Vaccine A
summary: Firewall, vaccine, cleaner... Place various blocks to protect your CPU! Vaccine A is a sandbox defense game, filled with parody of various programs.

name: Vatman
summary:
Vatman is a side-scrolling beat-em-up that was given away free with Your Sinclair Issue 46, on their covertape "Smash Tape No. 22"

Your goal is to travel through the level as mild-mannered Eric Jone's alter-ego Vatman, punching tax-swindling bad guys and avoiding hitting nice old ladies, until you get to the boss at the end of the level. Power ups are available to regain health lost by getting hit by enemies.

name: Vavala
summary: Vavala is not a simple puzzles and riddles adventure. Its atmosphere and artwork will turn the different challenges of each stage into real feats, making your journey a unique and beautiful experience.

name: Vainger
summary:
The Vainger returns to Io and finds itself betrayed. The enemy must be found and eradicated.

Game available on UFO 50.

name: Vanessa
summary: Vanessa is a superhero fighting simulator where you fight shadow bosses. Sexy spider ninja girls like Dragon Gwen your step sister, train you to fight crime and web like a spider rope hero using a grappling gun. Man, use the power of spider martial arts in this amazing third person hero game.

name: Vaping Simulator: Pepe Edition
summary:
Vaping Simulator 
 
Experience the most beautiful, truly amazing and yet realistic experience by being a Papi, discovering various vape mods and escaping from cutest enemies ever!

name: Vagrant Hearts Zero
summary: The prequel to the hit series Vagrant Hearts, Warfare Studios' most acclaimed RPG adventure!

name: Vampires Fable
summary: Vampires Fable is a coop, adventure, story-driven game for two players, combining the best of escape room games, puzzle games and arcade games. None of the players will be able to solve the puzzle alone. Whether you manage to find your way back to each other depends only on your communication.

name: Vaporwave Simulator
summary: Roam around this open world simulator game and feel the vapor. There are hidden easter eggs waiting to be discovered by only those capable. It's all in your head.

name: Valhall
summary: Valhall is a Viking universe. Now in Pre-Beta. Survive and fight in cruel Midgard, get out of Loki's trap, feel the Thor's power, become einherjar and enter the ultimate battlefield. Witness the beginning of the end of the world. Ragnarök is coming!

name: Valley of Kings
summary: An empire once sprawling with life, destroyed by the dragon's flames Venture into a ravaged world overtaken by wild beasts and bloodthirsty bandits. Build your settlement, explore unknowns lands, uncover great treasures, fight dangerous enemies, and ultimately bring an end to the dragon's reign!

name: Vampire's Slave
summary: You are kidnapped by a vampire and trapped in her castle! She feeds on you and treats you like a sex toy. Will you be able to escape the castle? Will you be able to turn the tables on her?

name: Valkyria Soul
summary: Fight as the Valkyrie Reginleiv in a fantasy RPG where you can collect, train, and transform a fully customizable army of powerful monsters! In a world devastated by the events of Ragnarok, two unlikely champions will rise to oppose the forces of evil.

name: Vacant
summary: Vacant is a point and click adventure game about Jade Bridgett-- a new intern at a mysterious government agency called "The Eye". On her first day, she gets put on a case to find three missing people, all at which are presumed dead. It's your job to find them and the culprit.

name: Valley of No Roads
summary: Valley of No Roads is a city building puzzle, where you create beautiful cityscapes and explore the procedurally generated maps. Build the relaxed city, that needs no roads.

name: Vanguard 2
summary:
Vanguard II was produced by SNK in 1984. 
 
SNK released 156 different machines in our database under this trade name, starting in 1979.
